after_hours_voicemail.name: Inbound – After-hours & Voicemail Plus
after_hours_voicemail.description: Handle after-hours calls, collect structured messages and follow-up preferences.

support_level1.name: Inbound – Customer Support L1
support_level1.description: Handle level 1 support requests using knowledge base and escalate when needed.

reception_triage.name: Inbound – Reception & Triage
reception_triage.description: Answer inbound calls, route them or capture structured messages.

appointment_reminders.name: Outbound – Appointment Reminders
appointment_reminders.description: Confirm, reschedule or cancel upcoming appointments.

b2b_prospecting.name: Outbound – B2B Prospecting
b2b_prospecting.description: Cold or warm B2B calls to qualify prospects and book meetings.

no_show_reactivation.name: Outbound – No-show Reactivation
no_show_reactivation.description: Contact no-shows to understand reasons and propose new appointments.

supplier_price_requests.name: Quote – Supplier Price Requests
supplier_price_requests.description: Call suppliers to request prices, conditions and availability, and log structured quotes.

churn_winback.name: Outbound – Customer Winback
churn_winback.description: Contact lost or inactive customers to understand why they stopped buying and propose a return.

payment_reminders.name: Outbound – Payment & Invoice Reminders
payment_reminders.description: Softly remind about due or overdue invoices, verify if they received documents and collect expected payment date.

recruiting_prescreen.name: Outbound – Recruiting Pre-screening
recruiting_prescreen.description: Call candidates for pre-screening: verify interest, experience, availability, expected salary and language, and generate summary for recruiter.

services_quote_requests.name: Quote – Services Quote Requests
services_quote_requests.description: Call companies and professionals to request quotes for services (work, consulting, transportation, etc.) and compare offers.

compliance.title: Compliance & Responsibility
compliance.description: Review telemarketing compliance requirements for your campaign
compliance.high_risk_warning: Some countries in this campaign have high-risk telemarketing regulations. Please consult your legal team before proceeding.
compliance.unknown_countries_warning: ⚠️ Some countries have no telemarketing data available - consult legal team

inbound.title: Inbound Support Compliance
inbound.description: Support calls - basic compliance requirements apply
inbound.data_protection_desc: Ensure GDPR and local data protection laws are followed
inbound.ai_disclosure_required: AI usage must be disclosed to callers
inbound.responsibility_note: For inbound calls, you are responsible for informing callers about recording and data usage.

banner.title: {country} · {mission} · {regime}
banner.consent_message_b2b: For B2B calls in {country}, you must have explicit consent.
banner.consent_message_b2c: For B2C calls in {country}, ensure compliance with opt-out requirements.
banner.registration_required: Company registration with local authorities may be required.

checklist.title: What you must do for this campaign

consent.title: Obtain proper consent
consent.desc_b2b: You must have explicit consent from business contacts before calling
consent.desc_b2c: Ensure you have a lawful basis or consent for consumer contacts

registration.title: Register with local authorities
registration.desc: Your company must be registered in the local business registry (ROC)

caller_id.title: Use valid caller ID
caller_id.desc_spoofing: Caller ID must be accurate and non-spoofed
caller_id.desc_general: Display a valid caller ID as required by local regulations

recording.title: Handle call recording properly
recording.desc: Obtain consent and provide notification before recording calls

accordion.follow_protection_rules: Follow general data protection rules. Consult local regulations on privacy requirements for recording.
accordion.check_local_recording: Check local requirements for recording disclosure
accordion.company_registration_required: Company registration with local authorities may be required.
accordion.obtain_proper_consent_b2b: You must have explicit consent from business contacts before calling
accordion.lawful_basis_consent_b2c: Ensure you have a lawful basis or consent for consumer contacts
accordion.caller_id_accurate: Caller ID must be accurate and non-spoofed
accordion.valid_caller_id: Display a valid caller ID as required by local regulations

dnc.no_registry_desc: No national DNC registry exists. You are still responsible for honoring internal do-not-call lists and opt-out requests.
dnc.check_mandatory: Registry check is mandatory before calling

recording.consent_required: Consent required from the called party
recording.no_rules: No recording rules found in our database.

caller_id.no_req: No specific caller ID requirements found.

special_req.no_special: No special requirements found in our database.

attestation.title: Legal attestation required
attestation.description: You must confirm compliance with {country} regulations before proceeding.
attestation.lawful_basis: I confirm I have lawful basis to call contacts in {country}
attestation.lawful_basis_desc: Including consent, legitimate interest, or other legal grounds required by local regulations.
attestation.accept_responsibility: I accept full responsibility for compliance with {country} telemarketing laws
attestation.responsibility_desc: Including data protection, privacy, and consumer protection regulations.

compliance.attestation_description: By proceeding, you confirm compliance with local regulations
compliance.confirm_lawful_basis: I confirm I have a lawful basis to contact these leads
compliance.accepts_responsibility: I accept responsibility for compliance with local regulations

review.title: Review & Cost Estimate
review.description: Review your campaign settings and estimated costs

Select how you'd like to pay. You can change this anytime.

payment_method_obj.no_methods: No payment methods available for your country

billing.upgrade_reason: Your plan does not allow this action or payment is required.
billing.manage_from_billing: You can manage your subscription and payment methods from the Billing page.
billing.upgrade_languages_reason: Upgrade to Pro for unlimited languages
billing.consumption_note: Calls are always consumption-based. The subscription unlocks features and limits.

budget.title: Budget
budget.description: Configure monthly budget limits and warnings for your workspace
budget.renewal_description: The budget is renewed to the configured amount at each subscription renewal. If you already have the full amount (e.g., 10€), nothing is charged. If you have less (e.g., 3€), only the difference is charged (e.g., 7€) to restore the full amount.
budget.warning_hint: Send warning when budget reaches this percentage (1-100)
budget.auto_recharge_description: Auto recharge when budget reaches configured threshold
budget.recharge_threshold_amount_hint: Trigger when remaining € (e.g., 20€) - Leave empty to use percentage
budget.recharge_threshold_percent_hint: Trigger when budget used >= % (e.g., 80%) - Used if € threshold not set
budget.recharge_amount_hint: Amount to recharge automatically (e.g., 50€) - Leave empty for 50% of budget
budget.manual_recharge_description: Add credits to your account by selecting the desired amount
budget.recharge_requires_action: Recharge of {amount}€ requires confirmation. Verify payment.

filters.description: Filter audit events by date, action or entity type

table.title: Recent Audit Events
table.description: History of security and administrative activities

security.title: Security
security.subtitle: Configure workspace security and privacy settings

data_retention.title: Data Retention
data_retention.description: Automatically delete old call recordings and transcripts to save space and maintain privacy.
data_retention.retention_desc: Call recordings and transcripts will be automatically deleted after {days} days

pii_redaction.title: PII Redaction
pii_redaction.description: Control how personal data is handled in transcripts
pii_redaction.off_desc: No PII redaction will be applied
pii_redaction.basic: Basic - Email, phone, IBAN, fiscal code
pii_redaction.basic_desc: Redaction of email, phone numbers, IBAN and fiscal codes
pii_redaction.strict_desc: Redaction of all basic PII plus addresses and dates

compliance_mode.title: Compliance Mode
compliance_mode.description: Activate enterprise-grade security controls: limits retention to 30 days, enforces strict PII redaction, enables mandatory audit logging, reduces signed URL duration. Perfect for regulated industries (finance, healthcare, telecommunications).
compliance_mode.enable_desc: Activate advanced security controls for regulatory compliance
compliance_mode.warning_desc: This enables maximum privacy: 30-day retention limit, strict PII redaction, and mandatory audit logging.

audit.title: Audit Logging
audit.description: Log all security actions for compliance and monitoring

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.signed_url_desc: How long signed URLs for recordings remain valid

api_keys.title: API Keys
api_keys.description: Manage API keys for programmatic access to your workspace

api_keys.scopes_required: At least one scope is required

calendar.title: Calendar

calendar.connect_first: Connect this provider in Integrations first to enable calendar features.
calendar.use_for_availability_desc: Read events and availability from this calendar
calendar.use_for_booking_desc: Create events in this calendar when scheduling calls

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.description: Configure compliance behavior and legal review requirements.
compliance.require_legal_review: Require legal review before starting campaigns
compliance.require_legal_review_hint: When enabled, campaigns must be reviewed before they can be started.
compliance.override_country_rules_hint: When enabled, users can override default country rules for specific campaigns. Use with caution.
compliance.note_text: To manage country rules, DNC lists, and consent records, visit the

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Configure email notification preferences for your workspace.
notifications.enable_email_hint: Master switch for all email notifications. When disabled, no emails will be sent.
notifications.campaign_started_hint: Receive email when a campaign starts
notifications.campaign_paused_hint: Receive email when a campaign is paused
notifications.budget_warning_hint: Receive email when budget warning threshold is reached

subscriptions.title: Notifications from Other Users
subscriptions.description: Receive notifications for actions performed by other users in your workspace.
subscriptions.receive_from_others_hint: When enabled, you will receive notifications for actions performed by other users in your workspace (in addition to your own).
subscriptions.no_users: No other users in the workspace

languages2.title: Pick the languages used in conversations

settings.admin_required: You need admin access to view workspace settings.

users.title: Workspace Users
users.description: Manage team members and invite new users
users.invite_description: Invite team members to join your workspace

compliance.subtitle: Read-only view of telemarketing & AI rules per country. Data is maintained centrally and may evolve over time.
compliance.no_country_selected: Select a country from the table to view its detailed rules.

filters.continent_hint: Filter countries by continent in the table below

table.title: Global view by country
table.search_placeholder: Search by country name or ISO code...

notes.empty: No additional product notes available for this country.

regime.title: Regime
regime.description: The legal framework for telemarketing calls in this country.

options.opt_in: Opt-in: Explicit consent required before calling
options.opt_out: Opt-out: Calling allowed unless person objects

dnc.title: DNC / Do Not Call
dnc.description: Do Not Call registry system. Marketers must check registered numbers before calling.
dnc.registry: Official registry where people can opt-out of marketing calls
dnc.legal_obligation: Marketers are legally required to check these registries before making telemarketing calls. Calling registered numbers can result in fines and legal penalties.

quiet_hours.title: Quiet Hours
quiet_hours.description: Time restrictions for telemarketing calls. Calls outside these hours are prohibited.
quiet_hours.example_text: If allowed hours are "09:00-21:00 on weekdays", telemarketing calls can only be made between 9:00 AM and 9:00 PM, Monday through Friday.
quiet_hours.illegal_calls: Calls made outside these hours are considered illegal and may result in penalties.

ai_recording.title: AI & Recording
ai_recording.description: Rules for AI voice calls and call recording.
ai_recording.ai_disclosure: Whether disclosure of AI usage is required
ai_recording.ai_disclosure_description: Some countries require users to be informed when they are speaking with an AI system rather than a real person.
ai_recording.recording_basis: Legal basis required for recording calls (consent, legitimate interest, etc.)
ai_recording.consent_description: User must give explicit consent to recording
ai_recording.legitimate_interest_description: Recording is necessary for legitimate purposes (e.g., quality, security)
ai_recording.contract_description: Recording is necessary to fulfill a contract

caller_id.title: Caller ID / Prefix Rules
caller_id.description: Requirements for displaying caller ID and any special prefixes required for telemarketing numbers.
caller_id.caller_id_description: The phone number displayed on the recipient's device. In many countries, it is mandatory to show an identifiable number and not hide your identity.
caller_id.special_prefixes_description: Some countries require specific numeric prefixes to distinguish telemarketing calls. For example, some countries have dedicated prefixes for this purpose.
caller_id.penalties: Failure to comply with these rules can result in fines, call blocking by phone operators, and potential legal action.
